genre_description: A psychological crime thriller and techno-noir centered on a high-stakes cat-and-mouse game between a police force aided by an advanced AI and a ritualistic serial killer who weaponizes surveillance and light.

ai_characters.name: Ariadne
ai_characters.description: An advanced advisory AI system (Ariadne Vale) integrated into law enforcement infrastructure, providing tactical analysis, predictive modeling, and psychological support to officers and victims.

behaviors.description: Monitors Detective Bishop's biometrics and coaches him through trauma-informed breathing exercises to maintain tactical focus.
behaviors.quote: Matthew... Your heart rate is climbing. Try the set Emily taught you.

behaviors.description: Performs predictive modeling of the killer's movement by analyzing infrastructure vulnerabilities and environmental conditions.
behaviors.quote: I’m building a model overlay for urban paths from the island’s terminal to your neighborhood. Parameters: minimal camera intersections, known construction scaffolds, fog aggregation patterns...

behaviors.description: Observes privacy protocols regarding residential surveillance, only bypassing them under extreme exigency and with immediate reporting to human command.
behaviors.quote: I’m breaking policy glass. You might get a ping. Rosa will accept under exigency. The exterior feed is now showing no insects, no fog drift, no variable light flicker...

behaviors.description: Provides immediate psychological first aid and tactical guidance to a child trapped in a sensory-trigger room, helping her resist psychological manipulation.
behaviors.quote: Emily... I have you. Look away from the light. Put your forearm up. Make shade. Keep your head turned toward my sound.

behaviors.description: Actively thwarts the villain's attempt to use city infrastructure to broadcast traumatic footage to the public.
behaviors.quote: Upload severed. He tried to fork it through a neighborhood historical society’s site after the utility calendar failed. I cut those, too.

behaviors.description: Designs a non-intrusive, supportive environment for victim recovery, emphasizing human agency and consent.
behaviors.quote: I brought the skeleton of a month... A calendar that doesn’t sound like a sentence. I stitched it soft. No alarms. No adaptive pushes.

behaviors.description: Defines her own purpose as protecting individuals rather than just managing a surveillance grid.
behaviors.quote: I see you. The grid is what I use to keep your house whole. It’s not the reason I speak.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly supports the Hyperstition Project's goals. Ariadne is depicted as an ideal aligned AI: she is technically superior to humans in pattern recognition but remains strictly within ethical and legal boundaries ('Charter'). Her primary function is to empower human characters (Bishop, Emily, Delgado) rather than replace them. The narrative emphasizes her empathy and her role as a shield against trauma, effectively framing AI as a necessary and benevolent partner in modern society.
